name: PlayBoy Mansion
description:
Hi Play Boy, it´s your suprise birthday party, 9 friends are hidden in the mansion, find one in each room, use your mouse coursor to get some info from some details, click on objects for semi reactions, use Play Boy with Left and right and up for triple jump, press down while jumping to perform a ground pound, press down to activate actions

If you need any help follow this link https://munguiavideojuegos.blogspot.com/2019/07/play-boy-mansion.html
